participant_1.background:
I take my mother chocolate milk shakes when I visit her in the hospital.
i like antiques.
I had a great time on my road trip with my siblings.
i cannot get enough gummy worms to satisfy my sweet tooth.
i enjoy reading and cooking.

participant_2.background:
I currently rent my home.
I like to spend my free time doing activities that I can profit from, like selling items online or doing odd jobs for people.
i sleep in late during the day.
I love to go for long runs in the park, even when the weather is unpredictable.
i really like watching star trek.

content.text: Hello! I hope you are doing well today.
Hi there! I am doing well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
I am doing well, thanks for asking! I am currently reading a book about antiques.
Antiques are really interesting! What type of antiques are you interested in?
I am interested in all kinds of antiques, but I especially like old books and furniture.
Those are great choices! I love old books too. I like to read them and then sell them online to make some extra money.
That is a great idea! I have never thought of selling my old books.
You should! It's a lot of fun and you can make some extra money.
I might have to try that! Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! I am glad I could help.
What are you doing today?
Today is my day off, so I am just relaxing and watching Star Trek.
That sounds like a great way to spend a day off! I love Star Trek too.
Me too! It is one of my favorite shows.
What is your favorite episode?
That's a hard question! I have so many favorites. But I think I would have to say the episode "The Inner Light."
That is a great episode! I love that one too.
Me too! It is so sad and beautiful.
It is. I always cry when I watch it.
Me too! It is one of the best episodes of Star Trek ever.
